General_Description: '''Pankration''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra took part in her last [[pankration]] event against [[Dorieus]] in order to win the event for [[Sparta]].
Section_Dialogue:
Having tended to [[Alkibiades]], Kassandra returned to the organizer [[Paios]] at the [[Stadium, Olympia|Stadium]].
*'''Paios:''' ''Your next opponent is Doreius—claims to be descended from [[Herakles]] himself!''
(Accept – "Time to fight.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm ready.''
*'''Paios:''' ''You ever faced an [[Olympic Games|Olympic]] champion before?''
----
(If players successfully concocted the body oil for [[Testikles]].)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''No, but I've gotten this far.''
'''Paios:''' ''Well, you don't look the part—you're not even oiled, for [[Zeus]]'s sake!''

<tabber>
|-|I have oil.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I do have some oil. It could come in handy... and it smelled good. I'll use it.''
Paios nodded in agreement.
|-|I have no need for oil.=
'''Kassandra:''' ''Less talking. More fighting.''
</tabber>
----
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've fought all sorts of people... and they were with more than just their fists. Let me in there.''
Paios shrugged as he led Kassandra inside the [[Stadium, Olympia|Stadium]] once again.
:(If [[Kallias]] was not killed beforehand)
:Before Kassandra could enter, she encountered Kallias, a member of the [[Cult of Kosmos]] whom she deduced had poisoned Alkibiades. They exchanged words with an undertone of hostile intent.
:*'''Kassandra:''' ''Come to wish me luck?''
:*'''Kallias:''' ''Of course, and if you win you should come dine with me sometime.''
:*'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe I'll hunt you down after the event... To take you up on your offer.''
:Kassandra walked up to the towering Kallias, who squinted down at her and her choice of words.
:*'''Kallias:''' ''Of course... after the event.''
:Kallias walked away.
Kassandra entered the Stadium to change into her athlete outfit. She took her mark in the arena, and [[Leander]] walked out to greet her.
:(If players chose to apply the body oil to Kassandra.)
:*'''Leander:''' ''Huh. You smell better than last time.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let's get this over with.''
*'''Leander:''' ''For [[Hera]]!''
Leander turned and walked back to the crowd.
*'''Leander:''' ''We've seen our esteemed newcomer rise quickly to become a contender...''
*'''Leander:''' ''But let's see how she goes against our reigning champion... Doreius!''
[[File:ACO Pankration Memory Screenshot 01.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra and Dorieus before the fight]]
The brutish Dorieus entered the arena and gesticulated. He took his mark, stretched his shoulders, and the final round began.

As the fight started, Kassandra landed a few blows on Dorieus.
*'''Leander:''' ''By the gods!''
Dorieus' size did not encumber his dodging, however. He hit back as good as he got.
*'''Dorieus:''' ''I will suck the marrow from your bones!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You'll have to try harder if you want to live!''
Dorieus continued his assault.
*'''Dorieus:''' ''I hope you like pain.''
In time, Kassandra turned the tide on her opponent.
*'''Leander:''' ''Just one mistake can change everything!''
After a challenging exchange, Kassandra finally overwhelmed Dorieus.
*'''Leander:''' ''Victory! [[Nike]]!''
[[File:ACO Pankration Memory Screenshot 03.png|thumb|250px|The coronation ceremony]]
The crowded applauded. Kassandra clasped her hands and bowed, then applauded her performance. The crowd later gathered at the [[Olympic Tree]] to witness Leander crown Kassandra as the pre-eminent Olympic champion, and [[Sparta]] as the overall winner.
*'''Leander:''' ''The gods have looked kindly on these, our champions... but there can only be one winner!''
*'''Leander:''' ''SPARTA!!!''
Kassandra walked up to Leander, with the crowd cheering behind. She turned around to be coronated with an [[olive]] {{Wiki|Olive wreath|wreath}}.
*'''Leander:''' ''Yours is eternal glory!''
A wide smile shone across Kassandra's face as her task for the [[two Kings of Sparta]] was officially completed.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra defeated the reigning [[pankration]] champion Dorieus, winning the event for Sparta and becoming an Olympic Champion.
Section_Trivia: *If [[Kallias]] was not slain before this event, he has a brief cutscene with Kassandra.
